rooms.description: Modern and spacious entrance with Vastu principles for welcoming energy.
Scandinavian inspired open-plan living area that combines living, dining, and kitchen in a seamless design with ample natural light.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated into the living area with high-end appliances and minimalistic design.
Spacious master bedroom featuring Scandinavian aesthetics, ensuring privacy and luxury comfort. Includes a walk-in closet.
Well-appointed guest bedroom with subtle Nordic design elements.
Functional study area designed for a bachelor pad, incorporating natural light and Scandinavian minimalism.

openings.description: Modern design with energy-efficient glass, aligning with local building norms.
Automated garage door for two-car parking space ensuring security and ease of access.

rooms.description: Spacious two-car garage with ample storage and utility area, designed in Scandinavian style.
